features: [Upgrade Memory Foam]--Different from ordinary foam, it is updated to a unique memory foam. After the pressure is released, the memory foam will slowly return to its original state. There is no loose shape problem, and it can be used thousands of times without deformation. Make your clients fall in love with your salon.

[Ergonomic curve design] - U-shaped edge design, keep the head level when lying flat, avoid head movement when eyelashes are extended and grafted, effectively stabilize sleeping posture, and facilitate work and operation. It also supports a lighter and more sensitive neck area. Provide neck support for your eyelash customers for maximum comfort in stretching applications

[Velvet pillowcase] - This eyelash grafting pillowcase is made of soft velvet and is beautifully made. The pillowcase is removable and machine washable, so you will always have a sanitary eyelash extension pillow. Pillow size: 20 x 8 x 4.7 inches. This eyelash pillow is a unique gift for Mother's Day or Valentine's Day.

[Efficient work] - The slot on the side of the pillowcase can keep your items close and tidy, and it is convenient to operate. It saves a lot of time when you graft eyelashes or do other eyelashes beauty, and is an ideal choice for professional beauticians.

[Comfortable]--High density sponge core pillow, outer velvet material, durable and practical. High quality material, Easy to place on the grooming bed for easy lash extension. Perfect for use in lash extensions, this sleeping neck pillow is a pillow every girl will love.
description: Enjoy the process of eyelash extension When using this pillow, lie down facing the ceiling. At this point, your head will be easily fixed and your face will not move from side to side. At the same time, you will not feel tight due to the softness of the sponge.
